message: i regret not getting joemetric off the ground, now folks are doing the concept left and right, heres an app thats geared getting people to snap photos for specific themes which could totally be used for research... http://appysnap.com/
cool apps go here, anything, research related or not
hopscotch is another snap a photo for a theme app, again this could easily be a mobile activity for prime etc http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/hopskoch/id423509583?mt=8
pretty cool SAT app for education http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/sat-score-quest-by-the-princeton/id428076854?mt=8 using these folks tech http://www.easellearning.com/
iphone app that does the waiting on hold so you dont have to http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/fast-customer-productivity/id421471487#
very cool 4 way video chat for droid and ios http://blog.appboy.com/2011/04/fring-brings-group-video-chat-to-mobile-phones/
Tapbot's new Twitter client is pretty sweet. The interface takes a bit to get used to, but there is an awful lot of fun things here... http://tapbots.com/blog/business/say-hello-to-tweetbot
another online ui test site http://www.trymyui.com/site/home
qwiki launches on the ipad, need to check this one out http://itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewSoftware?id=373717412&mt=8
this looks insanely crazy could be fun to try and do for an ignite or something or try at a meeting etc http://collabracam.com/
